00007 GPPopulation::GPPopulation(int size) {
00008         indexOfBest = 0;
00009         population.reserve(size);
00010         for (int i=0; i<size; i++) {
00011                 population.push_back(new GPProgram());
00012         }
00013 }
00014 
00015 GPPopulation::GPPopulation(const GPPopulation &other) {
00016         population.reserve(other.getSize());
00017         indexOfBest = other.getIndexOfBest();
00018         for (int i=0; i<other.getSize(); i++) {
00019                 population.push_back(new GPProgram(*(other.getIndividual(i))));
00020         }
00021 }
00022 
00023 GPPopulation::GPPopulation(int size, int indySize) {
00024 
00025         population.reserve(size);
00026 
00027         int numSubgroups = MAXDEPTH - 1;;
00028         int subgroupSize = size / numSubgroups;
00029         int remainder = size % numSubgroups;
00030         int depth = 2;
00031 
00032         for (int i = 0; i < numSubgroups; i++)  {
00033                 for (int j = 0; j < subgroupSize; j++) {
00034                         population.push_back(new GPProgram(indySize, depth));
00035                 }
00036                 depth++;
00037         }
00038         if (remainder != 0) {
00039                 for (int k = 0; k < remainder; k++) {
00040                         population.push_back(new GPProgram(indySize, intRandom(2, MAXDEPTH)));
00041                 }
00042         }
00043 }
00044 
00045 GPPopulation::~GPPopulation() {
00046         vector<GPProgram*>::iterator it = population.begin();
00047         while(it!=population.end()) {
00048                 delete *it;
00049                 it++;
00050         }
00051         population.clear();
00052 }
00053 
00054 void GPPopulation::operator=(const GPPopulation &rhs) {
00055 
00056         // get rid of current pop
00057         for (unsigned i=0; i<population.size(); i++) {
00058                 delete population[i];
00059         }
00060         // clear vector
00061         population.clear();
00062 
00063         indexOfBest = rhs.getIndexOfBest();
00064         for (int i=0; i<rhs.getSize(); i++) {
00065                 population.push_back(new GPProgram(*(rhs.getIndividual(i))));
00066         }
00067 }

00101 void GPPopulation::setIndividual(int index, GPProgram* indy) {
00102         delete population[index];
00103         population[index] = new GPProgram(*indy);

00106 GPProgram* GPPopulation::getBestIndividual() {
00107 
00108         GPProgram *ret; 
00109         double bestFitness = 1e19; //really damn big
00110         double currentFitness = 0;
00111         int bestIndex = 0;
00112         for (unsigned i=0; i<population.size(); i++) {
00113                 ret = population[i];
00114                 currentFitness = ret->getFitness(); 
00115                 if (currentFitness <= bestFitness) {
00116                         bestFitness = currentFitness;
00117                         bestIndex = i;
00118                 }
00119         }
00120         indexOfBest = bestIndex;
00121         //delete ret;
00122         return population[bestIndex];
00123 }
00124 
00125 void GPPopulation::updateBestIndividual() {
00126 
00127         GPProgram *ret; 
00128         double bestFitness = 1e19; //really damn big
00129         double currentFitness = 0;
00130         int bestIndex = 0;
00131         for (unsigned i=0; i<population.size(); i++) {
00132                 ret = population[i];
00133                 currentFitness = ret->getFitness(); 
00134                 if (currentFitness <= bestFitness) {
00135                         bestFitness = currentFitness;
00136                         bestIndex = i;
00137                 }
00138         }
00139         indexOfBest = bestIndex;
00140 }

00142 int GPPopulation::getIndexOfWorst() {
00143 
00144         int index = 0;
00145         //GPProgram* current = new GPProgram(*(population[0]));
00146         double worstFit = population[0]->getFitness();
00147         double currentFit = 0.0;
00148         for (unsigned i=1; i< population.size(); i++) {
00149                 //current = population[i];
00150                 //if (current->getFitness() > worstFit) {
00151                 currentFit = population[i]->getFitness();
00152                 if (currentFit > worstFit) {
00153                         worstFit = currentFit;
00154                         index = i;
00155                 }
00156         }
00157         //delete current;
00158         return index;
00159 }

00161 void GPPopulation::calculatePopulationFitness() {
00162 
00163         GPProgram *gpr;
00164 
00165         for (unsigned i = 0; i < population.size(); i++) {
00166                 gpr = population[i];
00167                 gpr->calcFitness(true);
00168                 //cout << "gpr is:\n" << *gpr << endl;
00169         }
00170         updateBestIndividual();
00171         //delete gpr;
00172 }

00174 ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const GPPopulation &pop) {
00175 
00176         GPProgram *gpr;
00177         for (int i=0; i<pop.getSize(); i++) {
00178                 gpr = pop.getIndividual(i);
00179                 os << *gpr << "\n";
00180         }
00181         // dont delete it - we'll need it later.
00182         //delete gpr;   
00183         return os;
00184 }
